name: Hope of Bion
description:
Returning home after a work trip Bion finds that his family is gone and the city is flooded by bloodthirsty creatures that someday used to be people. The hero goes on a search of his family, visiting the most various places and at the same time trying to survive.

Hope of Bion is an adventure game with a lean towards story and atmosphere. Visit different locations, examine the objects of environment and fight enemies using weapons of melee and ranged combat.

The features of the game:

  • interesting and atmospheric adventure with elements of horror;
  • different levels, both in terms of location and tasks;


  • ability to interact with the objects of environment and to communicate with the other survivors;
  • defend yourself using a baseball bat or a firearm, but remember that ammunition is not endless;


  • enemies need only one bite to kill the hero;
  • the game is being developed fully by one person.


You can follow the development on the official discord server - https://discord.gg/CgZWCkWh
